command_mode_action.description: The squad exudes aggression from a favorable firing position, doubling their normal attack range and deterring enemies.
command_mode_action.strategy_tip: This is a quick way to assign this stance to a variety of your bulk androids at once.

command_mode_action.description: In addition to their normal behavior from Deter And Defend, this squad will fire on civilian freight, troop transports, and other third parties.
command_mode_action.strategy_tip: This is a quick way to assign this stance to a variety of your bulk androids at once.

command_mode_action.description: The squad becomes even more intimidating. This adds substantial intimidation and deters enemies. Reduces attack range to 75% of normal.
command_mode_action.strategy_tip: This is a quick way to assign this stance to a variety of your bulk androids at once.

command_mode_action.description: Squad will hide or blend in and hunt for enemies to kill. When no enemies are present, they'll return to where they started.
command_mode_action.strategy_tip: A quick way to assign this stance to a variety of your bulk androids at once.

command_mode_action.description: Shelter Coordinators inform the homeless of shelter in your buildings.
command_mode_action.strategy_tip: If you tell them not to fill occupancy, they will comply.
